00049 //
00050 // FilterNode
00051 //
00052 // 21 July 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 // Restricts evaluation to only a subset of the documents
00055 // in the collection.
00056 //
00057 
00058 #ifndef INDRI_FILTERNODE_HPP
00059 #define INDRI_FILTERNODE_HPP
00060 
00061 class FilterNode : public BeliefNode {
00062 private:
00063   BeliefNode* _belief;
00064   std::vector<int> _documents;
00065   std::string _name;
00066   int _index;
00067 
00068 public:
00069   FilterNode( const std::string& name, BeliefNode* child, const std::vector<int>& documents )
00070     :
00071     _documents(documents)
00072   {
00073     _name = name;
00074     _belief = child;
00075     _index = 0;
00076     std::sort( _documents.begin(), _documents.end() );
00077   }
00078 
00079   int nextCandidateDocument() {
00080     int childNext = _belief->nextCandidateDocument();
00081 
00082     while( _index < _documents.size() && _documents[_index] < childNext )
00083       _index++;
00084     
00085     if( _index == _documents.size() )
00086       return MAX_INT32;
00087 
00088     return _documents[_index];
00089   }
00090 
00091   void annotate( Annotator& annotator, int documentID, int begin, int end ) {
00092     return _belief->annotate( annotator, documentID, begin, end );
00093   }
00094 
00095   const greedy_vector<ScoredExtentResult>& score( int documentID, int begin, int end, int documentLength ) {
00096     return _belief->score( documentID, begin, end, documentLength );
00097   }
00098 
00099   double maximumScore() {
00100     return _belief->maximumScore();
00101   }
00102 
00103   double maximumBackgroundScore() {
00104     return _belief->maximumBackgroundScore();
00105   }
00106 
00107   bool hasMatch( int documentID ) {
00108     return _belief->hasMatch( documentID );
00109   }
00110 
00111   const std::string& getName() const {
00112     return _name;
00113   }
00114 };
00115 
00116 #endif // INDRI_FILTERNODE_HPP
00117
